short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Install InspireMe - a custom New Tab with motivational wallpapers and backgrounds to make your day!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Install InspireMe - a custom New Tab with daily motivational wallpapers to make your day and empower you to reach your goals!
Replace your basic new tab with InspireMe's motivational wallpapers. Designed especially for hard workers with high ambitions.

Enhance your browsing experience with the New Tab extension for Chrome™. Customize your new tab page, enjoy an easy search experience, and power your searches with Microsoft Bing. 

By clicking "Add to chrome," I accept and agree to installing 'InspireMe', change New Tab to that provided by the service, New Tab searches to be provided by Microsoft Bing, the Terms of Use, and Privacy Policy.

InspireMe also offers time, date, and weather based on your geo-location, which can easily be turned off using the ‘Settings’ menu on the New Tab page.

Terms of Use: https://inspire-me.co/terms-and-conditions/
Privacy Policy: https://inspire-me.co/privacy-policy/
About Us: https://inspire-me.co/about/
Contact: https://inspire-me.co/contact/
Free stock media content is distributed by Unsplash - https://unsplash.com/

Install now and enjoy a beautiful browsing experience from the future with InspireMe each time you open a new tab.
